oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hitting probabilities of random covering sets in tori and metric spaces
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Järvenpää, Esa
Järvenpää, Maarit
Koivusalo, Henna
Li, Bing
Suomala, Ville
Xiao, Yimin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
Mathematics - Classical Analysis and ODEs
Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We provide sharp lower and upper bounds for the Hausdorff dimension of the intersection of a typical random covering set with a fixed analytic set both in Ahlfors regular metric spaces and in the $d$-dimensional torus. In metric spaces, we consider covering sets generated by balls and, in the torus, we deal with general analytic generating sets.
